"Whether it was Michael Vick or Brett Favre ," said Seán McManus , trying to explain this NFL viewership phenomenon. I think all of it generated interest...[ and] brought in a lot of people who wouldn't normally watch football. Seán McManus added that once curiosity is piqued, the games must be compelling enough to hold viewer interest. And most of them were.
